description: **!!! Following the [complete removal](https://github.com/firedm) of FireDM on GitHub, the package can no longer be maintained or downloaded. If you are using a previous version, updates will not be available. !!!**
summary: python open source (Internet Download Manager) with multi-connections, high speed engine, based on python, LibCurl, and youtube_dl
author: Mahmoud Elshahat (and contributors)
